title: Vertically aligned hematite nanosheets with (110) facets controllably exposed for ammonia synthesis with high faraday efficiency beyond 2.5 A cm-2
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03987D, Communication
Jinfeng Liu, Shiwen Du, Wenjun Fan, Qinglin Li, Qi Yang, Lin Luo, Jiangnan Li, Fuxiang Zhang
Hematite has been widely investigated for promising (photo)electrocatalysis due to its good robustness and abundant element content in earth, but its application in electrochemical synthesis of ammonia has been still...
